p: Consensus sequences were aligned by MUSCLE [ 30]. Phylogenetic analyses were performed by using RAxML v8.1.6, with the GTR model of nucleotide substitution and Î³-distributed rates among sites. Phylogenetic tree was constructed by maximum-likelihood using YFV genome sequences [ 31]. A NJ tree based on YFV genome sequences was also constructed to show the results were robust ( S3 Fig ). A total of 1,000 bootstrap replicates were performed. All SNPs were listed in S6 Table . The genome sequences of YF-BJ1, YF-BJ2, YF-BJ3, YF-BJ4, YF-BJ5, YF-FZ2, YF-FZ4, YF-FZ6, and YF-FZ7 were deposited in the NCBI GenBank database under the accession no. MH633684-MH633692.
